definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: San Marino has been occupied by foreign militaries three times in its history, for only short periods of time.
sentences.chinese: 圣马力诺在历史上有过三次被外国军队短期侵占。

sentences.english: San Marino is the only surviving Italian city-state.
sentences.chinese: 圣马力诺是仅存的意大利城邦。

sentences.english: Before the Euro, the Sammarinese lira was coupled to and exchangeable with the Italian lira.
sentences.chinese: 在欧元之前，圣马力诺里拉能与意大利里拉兑换。

sentences.english: San Marino was officially neutral in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 圣马力诺在第二次世界大战中正式宣布中立。

sentences.english: San Marino is one of the smallest nations in the world.
sentences.chinese: 圣马力诺是世界上最小的国家之一。

sentences.english: Men live longest in San Marino, where the average life expectancy for a boy born today is 81.
sentences.chinese: 男性平均寿命最长的是圣马力诺，为81岁。

sentences.english: Having joined the Council of Europe as a full member in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 1988年圣马力诺加入了欧洲理事会。

definition: abbr. for 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4] Bosnia and Herzegovina

pinyin: Jie2 ke4 Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4

definition: Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania
